title: mini-jv (nykky-cbrk)
description:
mini-jv (multi-position)


requirements

.primo 2.4
.resolution 480-272 | 800-480
.resolution 320-234 | 480-234 : use 480-272


news

.dual display (junctions nng on the "data.zip" + ".fjv" file)
.correct positioning (border)
.mini jv multi-position (right, left)

procedure

.delete (possible) archive minijv_20 or _24 (primo > ux)
.enter the (new) file minijv_24 (primo > ux)
.activate the display mini-jv (module): navigation menu > more > options >
  special settings > display junctions (mini) > activate > right | left

.if doesn't have, enter these commands in the sys files (sys and sys_ot):

[interface]
signposts_without_laneinfo=0

[navigation]
junction_view_type=mixed


credits

nykky + cbrk


tell us


reminder

before any operation,
always do prior backup.

grateful
